data.title: Walker County Revenue: Home
data.meta_description: Official website of the Walker County, Alabama Revenue Office
data.text:
Welcome to the Walker County Revenue Commissioner's Website

On behalf of the Walker County Revenue Commission, and through cooperation of the Walker County Commission, I am pleased to present our online property tax search, view and pay website. This site is provided as a convenient resource to our citizens so that they can conduct business online, efficiently and securely. Thank you for visiting this site.

My staff and I are glad to provide a value-added service that helps our customers save time and hopefully exceeds your expectations. If you have any questions or need additional information, please contact us. It is a privilege to serve the citizens of Walker County, Alabama.

To review your tax record or pay your taxes click here. If you are paying multiple parcels on an account please be sure to add each parcel to cart. You may also call (205)384-7267 to pay by phone. (Same processing fees apply)

2021-2023 Tax Year Business Personal Property Insolvent Listing

2023 Tax Year Delinquent Parcel Listing for Tax Lien Auction

Tax Lien Sale Information:

Each year, failure to pay Property Tax results in a Tax Lien Auction of the property. For more information about the Tax Lien Auction, please call the Revenue Commissioner's Office at (205) 384-7267. Our Tax Lien Auction is held on the first Monday in May each year, pending any unknown or emergency changes being required beyond our control.

The Tax Lien Auction will be held online at www.govease.com.

Please see the Rules of Tax Lien Auction as well as the Walker County Tax Sale Flyer.

Deadline to Pay Taxes:

Taxpayers will be able to pay online beginning October 1, 2024.

You may also pay by credit/debit card* over the phone after October 10th each year by calling (205)384-7267.

Walker County, AL, taxes are delinquent after December 31st. Penalties and interest begin accruing on January 1.

After February 15th payment of delinquent taxes MUST be paid by CASH, CERTIFIED CHECK, MONEY ORDER or CREDIT/DEBIT CARD*. Personal or business checks will NOT be accepted after that date.

*a $0.30 or 2.5% service fee, whichever is greater, will be applied to all credit/debit card transactions.

Warning:

DOXO is a third-party online bill payment website- they are NOT affiliated in any way with the Walker County Revenue Commissioner's Office.

DOXO may charge additional fees, and the Walker County Revenue Office cannot control when or even if payments will be received. Any late payments will result in interest and penalties being applied to your taxes.

It is advised to only use the links on our site to make payments directly to the Walker County Revenue Commissioner's Office.

News and Announcements

NOTICE: Sale of Tax Liens for Collecting Delinquent Property Tax

Title 40-10-180 (b) Code of Alabama The tax collecting official of each county shall have the sole authority to decide whether his or her county shall utilize the sale of a tax lien or the sale of property to collect delinquent property taxes and the method decided shall apply to all property in that county for that year and future years unless notice is given that changes the method as prescribed!

As the tax collecting official for Walker County, please accept this notice as a declaration of my intentions to conduct a Tax Lien Auction and Sale for the collection of delinquent taxes for the year 2020-2021 forward.

Title 40-10-180 (c) Code of Alabama requires that this notice be advertised once a week for three consecutive weeks, prior to October 1, 2020, in a newspaper with general circulation of said county, or the tax collecting officialÂ’s website.

Dated this 1st day of September 2020.

By: Jerry Guthrie, Walker County Revenue Commissioner
